_meta.title: Spiritual Growth 영적 성장
_meta.description: Soul evolution, spiritual awakening, and higher consciousness through tarot

The Fool.spiritual_meaning: The soul's leap into incarnation. Beginning of a new spiritual journey. Trust the universe and take the leap of faith.
The Fool.korean: 영혼의 화신으로의 도약. 새로운 영적 여정의 시작. 우주를 신뢰하고 믿음의 도약을 하세요.
The Fool.soul_lesson: Trust without proof. Faith in the unseen journey ahead.
The Fool.practice: Meditation on surrender and trust. Begin new spiritual practice.
The Fool.shadow: Spiritual bypassing or reckless spiritual seeking.
The Fool.advice: Your soul knows the way. Trust the journey, even when the path is unclear.

The Magician.spiritual_meaning: As above, so below. You are a channel for divine will. Conscious creation through aligned intention.
The Magician.korean: 위에서와 같이, 아래에서도. 당신은 신성한 의지의 통로입니다.
The Magician.soul_lesson: You are the bridge between heaven and earth.
The Magician.practice: Intentional manifestation work. Ritual magic. Prayer with purpose.
The Magician.shadow: Using spiritual power for ego gratification.
The Magician.advice: You are a conduit for divine energy. Channel it with pure intention.

The High Priestess.spiritual_meaning: The guardian of mysteries. Deep intuition and inner knowing. The veil between worlds is thin.
The High Priestess.korean: 신비의 수호자. 깊은 직관과 내면의 앎. 세계 사이의 베일이 얇습니다.
The High Priestess.soul_lesson: Wisdom comes from within. Trust your inner knowing above all else.
The High Priestess.practice: Silent meditation. Moon rituals. Dream work. Inner listening.
The High Priestess.shadow: Spiritual secrets used to control or exclude others.
The High Priestess.advice: The deepest spiritual truths are accessed in stillness and silence.

The Empress.spiritual_meaning: The Divine Feminine. Creative life force. Spirit expressing through nature and physical form.
The Empress.korean: 신성한 여성성. 창조적 생명력. 자연과 물리적 형태를 통해 표현되는 영혼.
The Empress.soul_lesson: Spirit is expressed through creation, beauty, and nurturing.
The Empress.practice: Nature communion. Creative expression as spiritual practice. Body as temple.
The Empress.shadow: Material attachment masquerading as spiritual abundance.
The Empress.advice: See the divine in all of creation. Spirit lives in the physical world.

The Emperor.spiritual_meaning: Divine order and structure. Spiritual discipline. The Father aspect of divinity.
The Emperor.korean: 신성한 질서와 구조. 영적 규율. 신성의 아버지 측면.
The Emperor.soul_lesson: Spirit requires structure and discipline to manifest effectively.
The Emperor.practice: Disciplined spiritual practice. Building lasting spiritual foundations.
The Emperor.shadow: Rigidity or authoritarianism in spiritual matters.
The Emperor.advice: Build your spiritual life on a foundation of discipline and order.

The Hierophant.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual tradition and teaching. The transmission of sacred knowledge. Finding your spiritual teacher.
The Hierophant.korean: 영적 전통과 가르침. 신성한 지식의 전달. 영적 스승 찾기.
The Hierophant.soul_lesson: Learn from those who walked the path before you.
The Hierophant.practice: Study with teachers. Engage with spiritual traditions. Teach what you know.
The Hierophant.shadow: Dogma, religious rigidity, giving away spiritual authority.
The Hierophant.advice: Respect spiritual traditions while finding your own direct connection to Source.

The Lovers.spiritual_meaning: Divine union. Integration of opposites. Choosing spiritual alignment over worldly temptation.
The Lovers.korean: 신성한 합일. 반대의 통합. 세속적 유혹보다 영적 정렬 선택.
The Lovers.soul_lesson: Union with the Divine requires integrating all parts of yourself.
The Lovers.practice: Sacred relationship work. Tantra. Integration practices.
The Lovers.shadow: Seeking divine love outside yourself. Spiritual codependency.
The Lovers.advice: The beloved you seek is within. Unite with your own divine nature.

The Chariot.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual will in action. Mastering the vehicles of body, mind, and emotion.
The Chariot.korean: 행동하는 영적 의지. 몸, 마음, 감정의 수레를 마스터하기.
The Chariot.soul_lesson: Direct your spiritual vehicles with conscious intention.
The Chariot.practice: Willful spiritual practices. Overcoming spiritual obstacles.
The Chariot.shadow: Spiritual ambition or ego-driven spiritual achievement.
The Chariot.advice: Take the reins of your spiritual journey with focused determination.

Strength.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual power through gentleness. Taming the inner beast with love. Courage of the heart.
Strength.korean: 부드러움을 통한 영적 힘. 사랑으로 내면의 야수 길들이기.
Strength.soul_lesson: True spiritual power is gentle, patient, and compassionate.
Strength.practice: Heart-centered practice. Working with shadow through love. Patience.
Strength.advice: The strongest spiritual force is love itself.

The Hermit.spiritual_meaning: The inner light. Solitary spiritual seeking. The wisdom of withdrawal. Light in the darkness.
The Hermit.korean: 내면의 빛. 고독한 영적 추구. 은둔의 지혜. 어둠 속의 빛.
The Hermit.soul_lesson: Find your own light within before trying to guide others.
The Hermit.practice: Solitary retreat. Silent meditation. Inner illumination work.
The Hermit.shadow: Spiritual isolation or superiority. Avoiding community.
The Hermit.advice: Go within to find the light that can illuminate others' paths.

Wheel of Fortune.spiritual_meaning: Karma and destiny. The wheel of reincarnation. Working with cycles and fate.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 카르마와 운명. 환생의 바퀴. 순환과 운명과 함께 작업하기.
Wheel of Fortune.soul_lesson: Understanding karma and the cycles of spiritual evolution.
Wheel of Fortune.practice: Karma clearing. Working with life cycles. Acceptance practice.
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Understand the wheel of karma, but don't be passive. You create your destiny.

Justice.spiritual_meaning: Divine justice. Karma balancing. Truth and spiritual accountability.
Justice.korean: 신성한 정의. 카르마 균형. 진실과 영적 책임.
Justice.soul_lesson: Perfect justice exists at the soul level. All is balanced.
Justice.practice: Truth-telling. Making amends. Karma work. Integrity.
Justice.shadow: Spiritual judgment of others or self-righteousness.
Justice.advice: Trust in divine justice while taking full responsibility for your choices.

The Hanged Man.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual surrender. Seeing from a higher perspective. Sacred pause and sacrifice.
The Hanged Man.korean: 영적 항복. 더 높은 관점에서 보기. 신성한 일시정지와 희생.
The Hanged Man.soul_lesson: Sometimes spiritual progress requires complete surrender.
The Hanged Man.practice: Surrender practices. Hanging upside down (inversions). Waiting.
The Hanged Man.advice: Surrender your limited perspective. The view from surrender is vast.

Death.spiritual_meaning: Ego death and spiritual transformation. The gateway between worlds. Release and rebirth.
Death.korean: 자아의 죽음과 영적 변화. 세계 사이의 관문. 해방과 재탄생.
Death.soul_lesson: What you cling to spiritually must die for you to be reborn.
Death.practice: Ego death work. Shamanic journey. Letting go practices. Grief work.
Death.shadow: Fear of spiritual transformation. Clinging to old spiritual identity.
Death.advice: Let your old spiritual self die. What emerges is more real.

Temperance.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual alchemy. Blending heaven and earth. The guardian angel. Sacred balance.
Temperance.korean: 영적 연금술. 천상과 지상의 조합. 수호천사. 신성한 균형.
Temperance.soul_lesson: True spirituality integrates all aspects of existence.
Temperance.practice: Alchemical work. Angel communication. Blending practices. Balance.
Temperance.shadow: Spiritual bypassing of difficult emotions or experiences.
Temperance.advice: Blend the spiritual and material into a golden whole.

The Devil.spiritual_meaning: Shadow work. Facing spiritual bondage. The illusion of separation from Source.
The Devil.korean: 그림자 작업. 영적 속박과 대면하기. 근원으로부터의 분리라는 환상.
The Devil.soul_lesson: What you deny spiritually controls you. Face your shadow.
The Devil.practice: Deep shadow work. Facing spiritual addictions. Breaking chains.
The Devil.shadow: Denial of shadow. Spiritual bypassing. False light.
The Devil.advice: Face your spiritual shadow. What you integrate liberates you.

The Tower.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual awakening through destruction. Shattering of illusions. Kundalini rising.
The Tower.korean: 파괴를 통한 영적 각성. 환상의 깨뜨림. 쿤달리니 상승.
The Tower.soul_lesson: Sometimes spiritual truth comes as a lightning bolt that destroys false structures.
The Tower.practice: Embrace spiritual crisis. Tower work. Rebuilding after destruction.
The Tower.advice: What the spiritual lightning destroys needed to fall. Trust the process.

The Star.spiritual_meaning: Divine hope and inspiration. Connection to higher self. Cosmic healing. Star seed consciousness.
The Star.korean: 신성한 희망과 영감. 고차원 자아와의 연결. 우주적 치유.
The Star.soul_lesson: You are a star. Your light comes from the cosmos itself.
The Star.practice: Star meditation. Cosmic connection. Healing work. Hope cultivation.
The Star.advice: You are made of stars. Let your cosmic nature shine.

The Moon.spiritual_meaning: The unconscious depths. Psychic development. Illusion and revelation. Shadow work.
The Moon.korean: 무의식의 깊이. 사이킥 개발. 환상과 계시. 그림자 작업.
The Moon.soul_lesson: Navigate the unconscious with intuition, not logic.
The Moon.practice: Dream work. Psychic development. Moon rituals. Shadow integration.
The Moon.advice: Trust your psychic nature to guide you through the dark night of the soul.

The Sun.spiritual_meaning: Enlightenment. Divine child consciousness. Radiant spiritual joy. Solar consciousness.
The Sun.korean: 깨달음. 신성한 아이 의식. 빛나는 영적 기쁨. 태양 의식.
The Sun.soul_lesson: Enlightenment is simple, joyful, and childlike.
The Sun.practice: Sun meditation. Celebrating spiritual joy. Inner child work. Radiance.
The Sun.shadow: Forced positivity. Denial of shadow in favor of 'light.'
The Sun.advice: Let your spiritual light shine simply and joyfully.

Judgement.spiritual_meaning: Spiritual awakening and rebirth. The call of the higher self. Resurrection consciousness.
Judgement.korean: 영적 각성과 재탄생. 고차원 자아의 부름. 부활 의식.
Judgement.soul_lesson: Answer the call of your higher self. Rise.
Judgement.practice: Answering the spiritual call. Past life work. Resurrection practice.
Judgement.shadow: Ignoring the spiritual call. Spiritual self-judgment.
Judgement.advice: Answer when Spirit calls. This is your moment of awakening.

The World.spiritual_meaning: Cosmic consciousness. Unity with all. Completion of a spiritual cycle. Mastery.
The World.korean: 우주 의식. 모든 것과의 합일. 영적 순환의 완성. 숙달.
The World.soul_lesson: You are one with everything. Separation was always an illusion.
The World.practice: Unity consciousness. Completion rituals. Celebration of wholeness.
The World.advice: You are already whole and complete. Remember this.
